lines.text:
[Junior is bashing out the other Hockey players at the game for revenge]
Junior, don't test me!

[Junior is watching Corkeys Cereal Commercial on the T.V]
Yeah, eat my shorts!

[after Corky, and Lila Duvane fall through the stage, and the sand bags fall on top of them]
Now THAT'S Entertainment!

[about Corky as Peter Pan]
But who is this Magical Boy?

[Appears as a Weed]
Ahem... He's a conceited little dweeb who's Parents are ROBBING HIM BLIND!

[on laughing gas]
Nurse Kiki, remove my trousers!
You can't just get out of a moving vehicle!
Well anything's better than listening to this lecture!

[about Junior wiping out the other Hockey Players and being kicked out of the League]
Dad, Hockey is a dangerous Sport.
No, it's not about Hockey, it's about the way You treat other People.
I did nothing to Blade and those other Guys, that they would have done to Me... except they couldn't have done it with as much Style!

Hi. This is me. Junior Healy. This is me and my dad Ben Healy. He's the best i love him and he loves me. This is my grandpa Big Ben Healy he's old wrinkly and mean. Believe it or not some people think i'm a devil but i'm not i'm an angel.
